inclusion.criterion: Stage II or III according to MGFA
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Cognitive problem and Mini Mental Test score below 24
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Modification of medical treatment and dose in last month
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Systemic, orthopedic and neurological disease in addition to the disease
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma with severe lower extremity weakness and urinary retention. They have undergone radiation and chemotherapy.
